issuetype.name: New Feature

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
Detect if the browser is capable of running Titanium and if not, display a message warning the user. This screen should be easily customizable by the developer. The browser detection should happen after the loader but before the project's app.js is downloaded.

Create a default warning template with no dependencies (i.e. inline images, styles, etc) in the mobileweb/src directory.

At compile time, if the Resources folder does NOT contain an overriding template, then use the default warning.
fields.summary: MobileWeb: Display warning message when running in old unsupported browsers

comments.body: Closing ticket as MobileWeb is no longer supported.
